original: krishna pi sh'a tsi s'a dha nam /
analyzed: krishna pi sh'a tsi s'a dha nam /

original: sha za nag po'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: sha za nag po'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Accomplishing Black Piśāca

original: na ma:krishna pi sh'a tsa ye sa ra sa ra sa sarba aarban me sv'a h'a /
analyzed: na ma:krishna pi sh'a tsa ye sa ra sa ra sa sarba aarban me sv'a h'a /

original: zhes so // tshes drug nas brtsams nas zan lhag ma'i rdog po spangs dang ldan pa la lan nyer gcig bzlas nas mtshan mo 'dre de la dbul lo //
analyzed: zhes so // tshes drug nas brtsams nas zan lhag ma'i rdog po spangs dang ldan pa la lan nyer gcig bzlas nas mtshan mo 'dre de la dbul lo //
translated: Beginning from the sixth day, one should give that piśāca, who is endowed with abstention from a lump of leftover food, twenty-one times, in the evening.

original: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig nas nyi ma re re don re ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig nas nyi ma re re don re ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From the twenty-first day, he will give one thing every day.

original: de dag thams cad zad par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad zad par bya'o //
translated: All of those should be exhausted.

original: gtor ma dang / cho ga la sogs pas mnyes par byas na las gzhan yang byed do zhes so //
analyzed: gtor ma dang / cho ga la sogs pas mnyes par byas na las gzhan yang byed do zhes so //
translated: If one pleases him with offerings, rituals, and so forth, he will also do other work.

original: 'dre nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'dre nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The Means of Accomplishing Black Piśāca is complete.
